When President Ashton is shot moments after his arrival in Spain, chaos ensues and disparate lives collide in the hunt for the assassin.(n)

programme.title: The Edge of Seventeen
programme.desc: Nadine (Hailee Steinfeld) and Krista (Haley Lu Richardson) are inseparable best friends attempting to navigate high school together, until Nadine's older brother Darian (Blake Jenner) and Krista begin dating. With her view of the world rocked, Nadine is forced to see the people in her life, including her well-meaning but distracted mother (Kyra Sedgwick), and unlikely mentor and History teacher Mr. Bruner (Woody Harrelson), with fresh eyes and new appreciation. She realizes that people - and life - are more complicated than she thought.(n)

programme.title: Apollo 13
programme.desc: When a fuel leak threatens to strand three astronauts in space, the ground crew and the mission team must struggle to avert catastrophe. The team's solutions are ingenious, led by Academy Award winner Tom Hanks. Directed by Academy Award winner Ron Howard, this is the gripping true story of the 1970's ill-fated moon voyage.(n)

programme.title: Mrs McCutcheon
programme.desc: Having always felt he was born in the wrong body, 10-year-old Tom chooses the name Mrs McCutcheon rather than the name he was given at birth; he also prefers the flow of a dress rather than the cut of a pant. Now at his third school, Tom is having trouble settling in and finding acceptance from his newfound peers - except for Trevor, a tough little charmer who also suffers prejudice due to his Aboriginal heritage.(n)

programme.title: Pirates of the Caribbean: Dead Man's Chest
programme.desc: Captain Jack Sparrow has a blood debt to pay. He owes his soul to the ghastly Davy Jones unless he can cheat death - and eternal damnation - by seizing the fabled Dead Man's Chest. Johnny Depp, Orlando Bloom and Keira Knightley star.(n)

programme.title: Jurassic Park
programme.desc: Academy Award winner Steven Spielberg directs this vision of a theme park featuring genetically-engineered dinosaurs. Who will survive when the dinosaurs run amok? Academy Award winner Richard Attenborough stars as misguided tycoon, John Hammond. Sam Neill and Academy Award nominees Laura Dern, Jeff Goldblum, and Samuel L. Jackson also star as the experts brought in to analyze the nuances of the new park.(n)

programme.title: The Lost World: Jurassic Park
programme.desc: Academy Award winner Steven Spielberg directs this follow-up to the original. Academy Award nominee Jeff Goldblum returns as Ian Malcolm, who is convinced by Academy Award winner Richard Attenborough to return to the land of the dinosaurs and rescue his girlfriend, played by Academy Award nominee Julianne Moore. When Malcolm arrives on the island, he stumbles into even more danger and action.(n)

programme.title: Jurassic Park III
programme.desc: Eight years after the InGen incident, Dr. Alan Grant is happy with his life far from any dinosaurs. He is extremely short on research money, and therefore accepts the offer of wealthy businessman Paul Kirby: A low flight over isolated Isla Sorna, where InGen's second research site was located. What Dr. Grant doesn't know is that Kirby needs a dinosaur expert to help him and his wife find their 14-year-old son Eric, who crashed on the island while paragliding.(n)

programme.title: Now You See Me, Now You Don't
programme.desc: A discontented Bill is asked to headline for an absent Roy. Nick and Eddie are presented with new opportunities. Amanda makes a shocking declaration. Cassie oversteps after a night out with Dawn.(n)

programme.title: The Rock
programme.desc: All of San Francisco is taken hostage when a vengeful general (Ed Harris) seizes control of Alcatraz Island, threatening to launch missiles loaded with deadly poison gas. With time running out, only a young FBI chemical weapons expert (Nicolas Cage) and a notorious federal prisoner (Sean Connery) have the skills to penetrate the island fortress and defuse the situation.(n)

programme.title: The Darkest Hour
programme.desc: Five young people find themselves stranded in Moscow, fighting to survive in the wake of a devastating alien attack in this sci-fi action thriller directed by Chris Gorak. Starring Emile Hirsch and Oliva Thirlby.

programme.title: The Harvest
programme.desc: A couple who keeps their sick son in a secluded environment find their controlled lives challenged by a young girl who moves in next door. The perfect family is not who they appear to be. Starring Michael Shannon.

programme.title: The Collector
programme.desc: An ex-convict who is desperate to pay off his debts schemes to rob his wealthy employer's home, unaware that the place is rigged with a series of fiendishly deadly traps. Josh Stewart, Michael Reilly Burke and Andrea Roth star in this clever horror thriller.

programme.title: The Pact
programme.desc: Nicole and Annie reluctantly return to their childhood home to pay their respects after their mother passes away. While staying overnight in the house, the sisters sense a mysterious presence in their midst - noises startling them in the night, objects moving about, a fallen picture of an unknown woman posed next to their mother. Annie begins experiencing a series of intense & disturbing dreams, and ­visions that lead to her mother's past finally revealing itself.

programme.title: Would You Rather
programme.desc: After the tragic death of her parents, Iris (Brittany Snow) is desperate to make ends meet while caring for her terminally ill younger brother. Shepard Lambrick (Jeffrey Combs), a philanthropist who expresses interest in helping them, invites her to an exclusive dinner party. When she arrives, she finds herself among a group of similarly desperate individuals. They are all trapped in Lambrick's mansion and forced to play a sadistic game where only the winner will get out alive.

programme.title: Contracted
programme.desc: Samantha (Townsend) is a twenty‐something party girl with little discipline and even less direction. After experiencing a lapse in her relationship with her lover (Stegeman), she's forced to move back in with her overbearing mother (Williams). Things take a turn for the worse when she spends the night with a mysterious man (Barrett), leaving her hung‐over and guilt‐ridden. However, something else is wrong with Samantha and she's infected. Unsure of the disease, she realizes she is the host of something catastrophic.

programme.title: Blood Sand
programme.desc: Sci-fi horror that centers around a group of hung over twenty-somethings who rise after a raging all-night graduation party to find the beach has turned into a carnivorous force that will devour anything with a heartbeat.

programme.title: Separated
programme.desc: In this short film, a wind-up toy robot goes on an epic journey to save his better half.

programme.title: A.R.C.H.I.E.
programme.desc: A recently orphaned 15-year-old who has moved to a small town to live with her uncle befriends a robotic canine with super strength, x-ray vision and the ability to talk and the pair take on a military complex, bullies, kidnappers, romance and the world.

programme.title: Willard
programme.desc: Willard Stiles (Bruce Davison) is a young man who lives alone with his mother. His boss is a vulgar, cruel man who is working Willard to death at his factory job. Lonely, depressed and isolated, Willard is on the verge of a breakdown when he makes a new friend: Ben, one of the many rats who live in his dilapidated home. Not only can Willard communicate with the rodent, but he can actually command him to do his bidding. Using Ben and his friends as instruments of retaliation, Willard commands his pets to carry out his vengeance.

programme.title: Lady Psycho Killer
programme.desc: A knife-wielding killer is on the loose in a small town slicing and dicing men of questionable intent. As her brutality leaves the town littered with corpses, her bloodlust is lost on her young lover who pursues her anyway.

programme.title: Tron
programme.desc: When a brilliant video game maker named Flynn (Jeff Bridges) hacks the mainframe of his ex-employer, he is beamed inside a digital world and becomes part of the very game he is designing.

programme.title: Refuge
programme.desc: Post-apocalyptic thriller set in the ruins of a collapsed America where a family struggles to survive and rebuild a life in the wake of a catastrophic plague that has wiped out most of the surrounding civilization. When they take in an injured young man, it may threaten everything they have.

programme.title: The Lawnmower Man
programme.desc: A scientist performs experiments involving intelligence enhancing drugs and virtual reality on a simple-minded gardener. The gardener is put on an extensive schedule of learning and quickly becomes brilliant. He has a few ideas of his own on how the research should continue and the scientist begins losing control of his experiment.

programme.title: Sleepwalkers
programme.desc: Tanya (Mädchen Amick) is a sexually curious virgin who falls for Charles (Brian Krause), the new boy in school, only to learn too late that he's a life-sucking sleepwalker. Charles and his mother, Mary (Alice Krige), are the last of a dying breed who are able to stay alive by feeding on the life force of young women. Able to mutate at will, they roam the Earth, forever fleeing discovery while searching for the next victim.

programme.title: Single White Female
programme.desc: Hedy (Jennifer Jason Leigh) appears at the apartment of Allie (Bridget Fonda) just as she has thrown out her unfaithful boyfriend (Steven Weber). The surviving half of a set of twins, Hedy perpetually seeks someone to complete her, and sees in Allie everything she would like to be. Hedy moves not only into the apartment, but into the most personal aspects of Allie's life, including having her hair styled exactly to match her roommate's. When Allie reconciles with her boyfriend, the unspoken bargain between the women goes terrifyingly awry.

programme.title: Willard
programme.desc: Willard Stiles (Bruce Davison) is a young man who lives alone with his mother. His boss is a vulgar, cruel man who is working Willard to death at his factory job. Lonely, depressed and isolated, Willard is on the verge of a breakdown when he makes a new friend: Ben, one of the many rats who live in his dilapidated home. Not only can Willard communicate with the rodent, but he can actually command him to do his bidding. Using Ben and his friends as instruments of retaliation, Willard commands his pets to carry out his vengeance.

programme.title: Silent Hill
programme.desc: Desperate to find a cure for her daughter Sharon's bizarre episodes, Rose (Radha Mitchell) flees with Sharon and heads for Silent Hill, the town her daughter names in her trances. But as they approach the deserted town, a mysterious figure appears, forcing Rose to crash. When she comes to, Sharon is gone, and suddenly Rose must enlist the help of a determined police officer (Laurie Holden) from a nearby town to help on her desperate quest to find her child.

programme.title: The Scarehouse
programme.desc: Two years after a tragic accident, six girls are invited to a party inside an elaborate Halloween funhouse. Once inside, they realize the true purpose of the event: to torture them as part of a revenge scheme. Corey and Elaina have spent their entire time in jail planning the elaborate payback since being solely blamed for the accident two years prior. As the night goes on, they all realize there is more to the scandal and cover-up than previously thought.

programme.title: Single White Female
programme.desc: Hedy (Jennifer Jason Leigh) appears at the apartment of Allie (Bridget Fonda) just as she has thrown out her unfaithful boyfriend (Steven Weber). The surviving half of a set of twins, Hedy perpetually seeks someone to complete her, and sees in Allie everything she would like to be. Hedy moves not only into the apartment, but into the most personal aspects of Allie's life, including having her hair styled exactly to match her roommate's. When Allie reconciles with her boyfriend, the unspoken bargain between the women goes terrifyingly awry.

programme.title: Single White Female 2: The Psycho
programme.desc: When Holly Parker (Kristen Miller) moves into her new apartment, she thinks she has found the perfect roommate: Tess Kositch (Allison Lange), a sweet and shy young woman who wants to be her friend. But underneath Tess' shy exterior lies a killer who believes there is nothing sweeter in life than murdering a friend in pain. And Holly is feeling a lot of pain lately, what with her boyfriend cheating on her and her co-worker undermining any chance she has for promotion. But Holly need not worry, Tess will take care of her.

programme.title: Willard
programme.desc: Willard Stiles (Bruce Davison) is a young man who lives alone with his mother. His boss is a vulgar, cruel man who is working Willard to death at his factory job. Lonely, depressed and isolated, Willard is on the verge of a breakdown when he makes a new friend: Ben, one of the many rats who live in his dilapidated home. Not only can Willard communicate with the rodent, but he can actually command him to do his bidding. Using Ben and his friends as instruments of retaliation, Willard commands his pets to carry out his vengeance.

programme.title: Push (2009)
programme.desc: A clairvoyant teenager (Dakota Fanning) and a telekinetic fugitive (Chris Evans) team up to find a missing woman who is the key to exposing a sinister, secret government agency that's building a clandestine army of psychic warriors. Djimon Hounsou costars in this sci-fi action thriller.

programme.title: Bang Bang Baby
programme.desc: In this dreamy sci-fi musical set in the 1960s, an isolated small town teenager believes her hopes of becoming a famous singer will come true when her rock star idol gets stranded in town and romance blooms between them but a leak in a nearby chemical plant threatens to turn her dream into a nightmare.

programme.title: Rabid
programme.desc: After a young woman has a motorcycle accident that leads to experimental surgery to save her life, she develops a taste for blood that spurs a city-wide zombie epidemic.

programme.title: Superhero Movie
programme.desc: This rib-tickling spoof of comic book adventures stars Drake Bell as a teenager who is bitten by a radioactive dragonfly and attains super powers. Leslie Nielsen and Tracy Morgan costar in this hilarious send-up.

programme.title: Cell
programme.desc: At the Boston airport, Clay (John Cusack) witnesses a scene of chaotic mayhem when an electronic signal turns hundreds of cell phone users into rabid killers. Desperate to find his estranged wife and son, Clay teams with a train driver (Samuel L. Jackson) to battle the horde of murderous phoners as the city descends into madness.

programme.title: Push (2009)
programme.desc: A clairvoyant teenager (Dakota Fanning) and a telekinetic fugitive (Chris Evans) team up to find a missing woman who is the key to exposing a sinister, secret government agency that's building a clandestine army of psychic warriors. Djimon Hounsou costars in this sci-fi action thriller.

programme.title: Blood and Chocolate
programme.desc: A teenage werewolf living in Bucharest falls in love with a visiting American artist and threatens the future of her entire species by pursuing the romance. Agnes Brucker, Hugh Dancy and Olivier Martinez star in this ominous, supernatural love story based on the novel by Annette Curtis Klause.

programme.title: Clockstoppers
programme.desc: Sci-fi action highlights this breezy fantasy starring Jesse Bradford as Zak Gibbs, a high school student who "borrows" the latest invention of his scientist dad, a "hyper-time" device that impresses a pretty exchange student (Paula Garces) but also attracts the attention of a sinister government agent (Michael Biehn). French Stewart and Julia Sweeney costar in this teen adventure in the tradition of "Back to the Future.".

programme.title: Superhero Movie
programme.desc: This rib-tickling spoof of comic book adventures stars Drake Bell as a teenager who is bitten by a radioactive dragonfly and attains super powers. Leslie Nielsen and Tracy Morgan costar in this hilarious send-up.(n)

programme.title: Push (2009)
programme.desc: A clairvoyant teenager (Dakota Fanning) and a telekinetic fugitive (Chris Evans) team up to find a missing woman who is the key to exposing a sinister, secret government agency that's building a clandestine army of psychic warriors. Djimon Hounsou costars in this sci-fi action thriller.(n)

programme.title: Hardcore Henry
programme.desc: In the world's first action-adventure film shot entirely from a first person perspective, a resurrected cyborg named Henry must fight through the streets of Moscow in pursuit of his kidnapped wife.(n)

programme.title: The Eyes
programme.desc: When six strangers with unspeakable pasts wake up imprisoned in an abandoned warehouse, they discover they are being forced to participate in an evil experiment. Five of them must die, only one can live and they have two hours to decide amongst themselves who survives. The clock is ticking and if they don't decide, they will all die.(n)

programme.title: It Stains The Sands Red
programme.desc: In the throes of a zombie apocalypse, Molly - a troubled woman from Las Vegas with a dark past - finds herself stranded in the desert with a ravenous zombie on her tail. At first, she's easily able to outpace her undead pursuer, but things quickly become worse when she realizes the zombie doesn't need to ever stop and rest. Running low on supplies and beat down by the harsh environment, Molly must summon strength she never knew she had in order to face it.(n)

programme.title: Superhero Movie
programme.desc: This rib-tickling spoof of comic book adventures stars Drake Bell as a teenager who is bitten by a radioactive dragonfly and attains super powers. Leslie Nielsen and Tracy Morgan costar in this hilarious send-up.(n)

programme.title: Cody the Robosapien
programme.desc: When a 12-year-old boy discovers a broken robot, he finds a zany and powerful new best friend who can change his life for the better but when the evil corporation that funded the robot's creation intervenes, the pair must team up to save their family.(n)

programme.title: Personal Shopper
programme.desc: By day, American in Paris Maureen (Kristen Stewart) works as a personal shopper, motor-biking around the city buying up deluxe couture for a celebrity client. By night, she attempts to channel the spirits of the dead, hoping to make contact with her recently deceased twin brother. When Maureen begins receiving a series of chilling, increasingly sinister text messages, it seems she may have made contact - but she doesn't know with whom.(n)

programme.title: Clockstoppers
programme.desc: Sci-fi action highlights this breezy fantasy starring Jesse Bradford as Zak Gibbs, a high school student who "borrows" the latest invention of his scientist dad, a "hyper-time" device that impresses a pretty exchange student (Paula Garces) but also attracts the attention of a sinister government agent (Michael Biehn). French Stewart and Julia Sweeney costar in this teen adventure in the tradition of "Back to the Future.".(n)

programme.title: The Host
programme.desc: When an unseen enemy threatens mankind by taking over their bodies and erasing their memories, Melanie (Saoirse Ronan) risks everything to protect the people she loves — her friends, her brother and her Uncle Jeb (William Hurt).(n)

programme.title: The Haunting
programme.desc: In the 1860's, Hugh Crain finances the construction of Hill House, then dies an unexplained death. Tales circulate that the mansion is haunted by evil spirits. 130 years later, Dr. David Marrow (Liam Neeson), long fascinated by the Hill House legend, brings three people there for what he tells them will be a study in sleep disorders. They're outwardly brave, but it soon becomes evident that Hill House's sinister reputation has all of them on edge. Catherine Zeta-Jones, Lili Taylor and Owen Wilson costar.(n)

programme.title: Personal Shopper
programme.desc: By day, American in Paris Maureen (Kristen Stewart) works as a personal shopper, motor-biking around the city buying up deluxe couture for a celebrity client. By night, she attempts to channel the spirits of the dead, hoping to make contact with her recently deceased twin brother. When Maureen begins receiving a series of chilling, increasingly sinister text messages, it seems she may have made contact - but she doesn't know with whom.(n)

programme.title: Encino Man
programme.desc: Two high school buddies dig up a frozen caveman in their backyard. Once the living fossil thaws out, the friends realize he's their ticket to being cool. Starring Pauly Shore, Sean Astin and Brendan Fraser.(n)

programme.title: Clockstoppers
programme.desc: Sci-fi action highlights this breezy fantasy starring Jesse Bradford as Zak Gibbs, a high school student who "borrows" the latest invention of his scientist dad, a "hyper-time" device that impresses a pretty exchange student (Paula Garces) but also attracts the attention of a sinister government agent (Michael Biehn). French Stewart and Julia Sweeney costar in this teen adventure in the tradition of "Back to the Future.".(n)

programme.title: Tim & Faith: Soul2Soul
programme.desc: Includes live performances from Tim McGraw and Faith Hill's 2017 Soul2Soul world tour, as well as an intimate look inside their relationship. Never before seen interviews are presented along side behind-the-scenes footage, capturing their chemistry on and off the stage. Directed and executive produced by the award-winning team of Dan Cutforth and Jane Lipsitz.

programme.title: Risk
programme.desc: In the new world order where a single keystroke can alter history, WikiLeaks founder Julian Assange is undeterred - even as the legal jeopardy he faces threatens to undermine the organization he leads and fracture the movement he inspired. Capturing this story with unprecedented access, Academy Award® winning director Laura Poitras finds herself caught between the motives and contradictions of Assange and his inner circle in a documentary portrait of power, betrayal, truth and sacrifice.

programme.title: Dolan's Cadillac
programme.desc: Robinson (Wes Bentley) is a law-abiding schoolteacher until his wife Elizabeth unexpectedly witnesses a murder. The killer is Jimmy Dolan (Christian Slater), Las Vegas' most ruthless and untouchable mob boss. Elizabeth agrees to testify, and faces deadly consequences. Devastated by her death, Robinson tries everything to bring Dolan to justice. Without hard evidence however, Dolan remains free. Haunted by the ghost of wife, Robinson transforms himself into a vengeance-obsessed machine, pushing himself beyond the breaking point.

programme.title: Last Weekend
programme.desc: Celia (Patricia Clarkson) is an aging matriarch who wants everyone to gather one last time at her family's gorgeous Lake Tahoe manor and reminisce before she puts it on the market. However, her sons are too preoccupied with their own busy lives and struggling relationships for any nostalgia. The dream of a splendid Labor Day weekend dies quickly in a whirlwind of contention, crisis and family dysfunction. Celia is forced to let go of her fantasy and attend to the harsh reality brought on by a sudden emergency.

programme.title: Bad Ass 2: Bad Asses
programme.desc: In this buddy drama, a Vietnam vet and his grumpy yet lovable sidekick team up to find the killer of a young boxer and clean up the streets of LA only to be drawn into an international crime ring. Stars Danny Trejo and Danny Glover.

programme.title: The 4th
programme.desc: Jamie is a down-on-his-luck illustrator who's behind on rent and tries to throw a cookout while his overbearing roommate is out of town on the 4th of July. He decides to borrow his roommate's bike for a quick trip to buy lighter fluid, but his entire day and life quickly go up in smoke. After an incident with a road-rager, Jamie finds himself far from home and trapped in a series of awkward and infuriating situations with strangers.

programme.title: Samuel Beckett: Waiting for Andre
programme.desc: The story of driver Samuel Beckett's school runs with 12-year-old Andre Roussimoff, who is too big for the school bus and later becomes legendary wrestler Andre the Giant. Over the course of a year their friendship evolves.

programme.title: Two Weeks
programme.desc: A quartet of siblings gather at the North Carolina home of their dying mother, where squabbling, bickering, and ultimately, emotional healing and grace, are in the offing. Sally Field and Ben Chaplin lead the cast of this ensemble comedy-drama, costarring Julianne Nicholson and Tom Cavanagh.

programme.title: Blood and Chocolate
programme.desc: A teenage werewolf living in Bucharest falls in love with a visiting American artist and threatens the future of her entire species by pursuing the romance. Agnes Brucker, Hugh Dancy and Olivier Martinez star in this ominous, supernatural love story based on the novel by Annette Curtis Klause.

programme.title: Wolves
programme.desc: Anthony (Taylor John Smith) is a standout player on his high school's basketball team with everything going for him: a killer three-point shot, a loving girlfriend (Zazie Beetz) and a chance at a scholarship to Cornell. But Anthony's dreams of playing college ball are jeopardized by his volatile father (Michael Shannon), a hard-drinking writer whose compulsive gambling threatens to derail the lives of both his wife (Carla Gugino) and son. Anthony must summon the strength to step out from his father's shadow and reclaim his future.

programme.title: My One and Only
programme.desc: After she catches her husband cheating on her, a charming, flamboyant socialite packs her two young sons into a Coupe de Ville and embarks on a cross-country journey to find a new head of the family. Renee Zellweger, Logan Lerman and Kevin Bacon star in this comedy-drama loosely based on a true story.

programme.title: Comet
programme.desc: Justin Long and Emmy Rossum are star-crossed lovers in an alternate universe, whose relationship blooms and unravels over the course of six years. A chance encounter brings them together, and the story zigzags back and forth in time—from a meteor shower in LA, to an encounter in a Paris hotel room, to a fateful phone call— resulting in a portrait of the relationship between the cynical Dell (Long) and the quick-witted Kimberly (Rossum).

programme.title: Crossroads
programme.desc: Pop music sensation Britney Spears stars in this teen road-trip drama about a trio of high school pals that heads for the bright lights of Los Angeles, meeting up with both romance and loss along the way. Zoe Saldana, Taryn Manning, Anson Mount, Dan Aykroyd and Kim Cattrall costar in this film from director Tamra Davis ("Billy Madison").

programme.title: George Michael: Freedom
programme.desc: Documentary covering the span of his career, but concentrating on the formative period in the late Grammy Award winner's life, leading up to and following the making of his acclaimed album 'Listen Without Prejudice Vol. 1' and the subsequent High Court battle with his record label that followed, while also becoming poignantly personal about the death of his late partner and first love, Anselmo Feleppa. Filmed before Michael's untimely passing, the film is narrated by him, who was heavily involved in the making of it.

programme.title: The Babadook
programme.desc: Six years after the violent death of her husband, Amelia (Essie Davis) is at a loss. She struggles to discipline her out-of-control son, Samuel (Noah Wiseman), who she finds impossible to love. Samuel's dreams are plagued by a monster he believes is coming to kill them both. When a disturbing storybook turns up at their house, Samuel is convinced that the Babadook is the creature he's been dreaming about. His hallucinations spiral out of control, he becomes more unpredictable and violent.

programme.title: ATM
programme.desc: After leaving a party together, coworkers David (Brian Geraghty), Emily (Alice Eve) and Corey (Josh Peck) stop at an ATM. Pulling into a desolate parking lot, Corey gets out to get cash and a routine transaction turns into a struggle for survival when an unknown man appears outside blocking their exit. With the wintry temperatures dipping below freezing, and the morning sunrise still hours away, they have no choice but to play the man's deadly game of cat-and-mouse.

programme.title: TIFFANY HADDISH: SHE READY! From the Hood to Hollywood!
programme.desc: In this hour-long special filmed at the Nate Holden Performing Arts Center, rising comedy star Tiffany Haddish takes the stage in her hometown of Los Angeles to tackle subjects ranging from her early days in foster care and being bullied on the playground, to getting her revenge on ex-boyfriends and introducing Will and Jada Pinkett Smith to Groupon.

programme.title: Comet
programme.desc: Justin Long and Emmy Rossum are star-crossed lovers in an alternate universe, whose relationship blooms and unravels over the course of six years. A chance encounter brings them together, and the story zigzags back and forth in time—from a meteor shower in LA, to an encounter in a Paris hotel room, to a fateful phone call— resulting in a portrait of the relationship between the cynical Dell (Long) and the quick-witted Kimberly (Rossum).

programme.title: My One and Only
programme.desc: After she catches her husband cheating on her, a charming, flamboyant socialite packs her two young sons into a Coupe de Ville and embarks on a cross-country journey to find a new head of the family. Renee Zellweger, Logan Lerman and Kevin Bacon star in this comedy-drama loosely based on a true story.

programme.title: Wolves
programme.desc: Anthony (Taylor John Smith) is a standout player on his high school's basketball team with everything going for him: a killer three-point shot, a loving girlfriend (Zazie Beetz) and a chance at a scholarship to Cornell. But Anthony's dreams of playing college ball are jeopardized by his volatile father (Michael Shannon), a hard-drinking writer whose compulsive gambling threatens to derail the lives of both his wife (Carla Gugino) and son. Anthony must summon the strength to step out from his father's shadow and reclaim his future.

programme.title: Lost Cat Corona
programme.desc: Dominic likes to play it safe, but Dom's M.O. is tested when his wife's cat goes missing and he sets out on a quest to find him. Over the course of one day, Dom endures neighborhood mayhem at every turn. He meets a deranged psychopath, endures a sideshow of a wake, and becomes unwittingly involved in the exchange of illegal knockoff handbags. As the day nears the end, a confrontation with a pair of badass teens forces Dom to face the issues that have been holding him hostage his entire life.

programme.title: Snowden
programme.desc: In 2013, Edward Snowden (Joseph Gordon-Levitt) quietly leaves his job at the NSA and flies to Hong Kong. There, he meets with two journalists and a filmmaker, and reveals U.S. government cyber surveillance programs of epic proportions. A top security contractor with virtuoso programming skills, Ed has discovered that a virtual mountain of data is being assembled tracking all forms of digital communication - not just from foreign governments and terror groups, but from ordinary Americans.

programme.title: Pride
programme.desc: Terrence Howard stars in this rousing true-life story of a Philadelphia swim coach in the mid-1970s who faces racism in trying to land a coaching position, and instead transforms a group of trash-talking inner-city teenagers into a championship squad. Bernie Mac, Kimberly Elise and Tom Arnold costar in this inspiring drama.

programme.title: Blue Chips
programme.desc: Championship-winning coach Pete Bell (Nick Nolte) runs the cleanest program in collegiate basketball. When he finds himself on the brink of his first losing season, Bell decides he must make a risky move to protect his job: under-the-table dollars for talent. Betraying his conscience and the trust of his ex-wife (Mary McDonnell), bell signs the nation's blue chips: a farm boy forward (Matt Nover), a playmaking guard from the projects (Penny Hardaway), and Neon Bodeaux (Shaquille O'Neal), a 7-foot slam-dunking phenom from the bayou.

programme.title: Fanboys
programme.desc: When they discover that a friend is going to die before the release of the long-awaited next chapter in a massively successful sci-fi movie franchise, a group of diehard sci-fi geeks travels cross country to steal a print from a legendary filmmaker, encountering everything along the way from rabidly rival fans of a competing epic series, to Las Vegas strippers. Jay Baruchel, Dan Fogler, Sam Huntington and Christopher Marquette star in this hilarious road trip comedy.

programme.title: Running Wild
programme.desc: A retired Air Force Major (Gregory Harrison), now a UN observer for the International Wildlife Organization, and his children confront elephant poachers in Zimbabwe. Simon MacCorkindale, Cody Jones and Brooke Nevin costar.

programme.title: The Rendezvous
programme.desc: Rachel, a Jewish-American doctor and Jake, an Arab-American government bureaucrat, are trying to solve the mysterious death of Rachel's brother. Racing around the world, they find themselves hunted by a doomsday group. The group believes Rachel and Jake possess an ancient script discovered by Rachel's brother that could bring about the end of days. Caught in the middle of a plot to hasten the end of mankind, Rachel and Jake must solve a murder and save the world.

programme.title: Whitney. "Can I Be Me"
programme.desc: Directors Nick Broomfield and Rudi Dolezal weave never before seen video, candid interviews and behind the scenes performance footage into a raw and uncensored portrait of Whitney Houston, who died suddenly at age 48 after years of struggling with addiction. Exploring her far-reaching impact, the directors focus on Houston's central dilemma: even though she had made millions of dollars and was recognized as having one of the greatest voices of all time, she still couldn't do what she wanted, either professionally or in her personal life.(c)

programme.title: The Light Between Oceans
programme.desc: Lighthouse keeper Tom Sherbourne (Michael Fassbender) and spirited Isabel (Alicia Vikander) live together in married bliss on a remote, rugged island off the coast of Australia. But their windswept world is turned upside down when Isabel learns that she's unable to bear a child. One day, a drifting lifeboat washes ashore with a crying baby in it. The dilemma the couple now faces echoes far beyond the island, engulfing and irrevocably impacting their world.(n)

programme.title: Mercy (2010)
programme.desc: A writer (Scott Caan) of highly sentimental love stories is secretly a womanizing cynic who has never actually experienced love, until he meets the beautiful and shockingly straightforward critic Mercy (Wendy Glenn), who is not fooled by his phony mawkishness. Erika Christensen costars in this romantic drama.(n)

programme.title: Pride
programme.desc: Terrence Howard stars in this rousing true-life story of a Philadelphia swim coach in the mid-1970s who faces racism in trying to land a coaching position, and instead transforms a group of trash-talking inner-city teenagers into a championship squad. Bernie Mac, Kimberly Elise and Tom Arnold costar in this inspiring drama.(n)

programme.title: The Punisher
programme.desc: Thomas Jane ("Deep Blue Sea," "Dreamcatcher") steps into the steel-tipped boots of Marvel Comics hero Frank Castle, a.k.a. The Punisher, a crusading vigilante out to topple the crime czar (John Travolta) who murdered his family. Rebecca Romijn, Ben Foster, Samantha Mathis, Roy Scheider and Will Patton costar in this crackling adaptation from writer/director Jonathan Hensleigh ("Jumanji," "Armageddon").(n)

programme.title: Bad Ass
programme.desc: A shunned Vietnam veteran who becomes a local hero after saving a man from attackers on a city bus decides to take action when his best friend is murdered and the police show little interest in solving the crime.(n)

programme.title: Gambler's Ballad: The Legend of Johnny Thompson
programme.desc: This film explores one of the greatest magicians and magic minds in history, Johnny Thompson. He teaches fellow magician Penn Jillette his signature piece called Gambler's Ballad.(n)

programme.title: The Fantasticks
programme.desc: Joel Grey and Brad Sullivan are small-town fathers conspiring to bring their children together in a love match by pretending to discourage it in this magical musical costarring Barnard Hughes.(n)

programme.title: XTC: This is Pop
programme.desc: Emerging from the late 1970s punk and new wave explosion, XTC amasses a devoted following with hit singles like 'Making Plans For Nigel' and 'Mayor Of Simpleton'. Presenting a journey into the world of the band, the film includes newly filmed interviews with Andy Partridge, Colin Moulding, Dave Gregory and Terry Chambers. Through a mixture of animation, archive and specially-shot sequences, the film explores the minds of principle songwriters, Partridge and Moulding.(n)

programme.title: Jimmy Neutron: Boy Genius
programme.desc: A ten-year-old genius inventor must rally his neighborhood pals to build an armada of spaceships and rescue their parents from a goopy alien race in time for dinner in this computer-animated box office blockbuster from Nickelodeon. Featuring the voices of Martin Short, Andrea Martin and Patrick Stewart.(n)

programme.title: The White King
programme.desc: Djata is a 12-year-old growing up in a brutal dictatorship shut off from the outside world. When the government imprisons his father and Djata and his mother are labeled traitors, the boy will not rest until he sees his father again.(n)

programme.title: Attack of the Killer Donuts
programme.desc: A chemical accident turns ordinary donuts into bloodthirsty monsters and three friends must track them down as they begin eating their victims. It's up to them to destroy the donuts and save their sleepy little town.(n)

programme.title: Body
programme.desc: After three twenty-something girls break into a mansion and inadvertently murder the groundskeeper, they slowly self-destruct as they decide what to do with the dead body in the living room.(n)

programme.title: Sleepless
programme.desc: When Las Vegas cop Vincent Downs (Jamie Foxx) and his partner Sean (Tip "T.I." Harris) rob a cocaine shipment bound for a drug-dealing casino boss (Dermot Mulroney), the desperate businessman retaliates by kidnapping Vincent's son (Octavius J. Johnson). Pursued by a dogged Internal Affairs investigator (Michelle Monaghan) and a sadistic drug kingpin (Scoot McNairy), Vincent must rely on his street smarts and sheer force of will as he tries to rescue his child over the course of a single night. Directed by Baran bo Odar.(n)

programme.title: The Free World
programme.desc: After spending two decades in prison for a crime he didn't commit, Mo (Boyd Holbrook) struggles to put his past behind him and readjust to a new life. Doris (Elisabeth Moss) is trapped in another sort of prison: an abusive marriage. When a dramatic encounter brings them together, Mo soon finds himself risking everything—including being locked up once again for someone else's crime—to protect the fragile Doris. Academy Award® winner Octavia Spencer and Sung Kang costar.(n)

programme.title: Bad Grandmas
programme.desc: Senior citizens Mimi, Bobbi, Virginia and Coralee quietly live out their twilight years in Southern Missouri playing cards and baking cakes. Bobbi's son-in-law, Jim, cons her into losing her house and Mimi, the unofficial leader of the group, decides to take matters into her own hands. Things spin out of control when she confronts Jim and he accidentally gets killed in the altercation.(n)

programme.title: Episode #510
programme.desc: Cyndi Lauper makes a guest appearance as Babylon plays host to the "Stop Prop14" benefit, an event that changes everyone's lives.

credits.director: Graphic Language, Adult Content, Violence, Nudity, Strong Sexual Content

programme.title: The Mom
programme.desc: Shanthi, Romesh’s Sri Lankan mother, arrives in America, and Romesh struggles to find the time that his mom, wife, children and uncle all demand while still focusing on his career.

credits.director: Adult Content, Adult Language, Brief Nudity

programme.title: The Money Issue
programme.desc: The financial reality of supporting his entire family in Los Angeles while earning nothing hits home for Romesh. He goes to some extreme measures to raise money in a short time for an ad campaign for his impending comedy show at The Greek Theater.

credits.director: Adult Content, Adult Language, Nudity, Strong Sexual Content

programme.title: 68 Kill
programme.desc: Trailer-dwelling, sewage-pumping Chip (Matthew Gray Gubler) has got one thing going for him: he's head over heels infatuated with his girlfriend Liza (AnnaLynne McCord). He's more than willing to overlook her wild streak—the fact that she's hooking up with their landlord; her rather extreme mood swings —so when she proposes a plot to steal $68,000, he goes along with the plan. But when what was supposed to be a simple heist turns into an off-the-rails, blood-spattered crime spree.

programme.title: College (2008)
programme.desc: Fraternity members haze three prospective students during a drunken orgy of a college-visitation weekend in this campus comedy starring Drake Bell, Kevin Covais and Andrew Caldwell.

programme.title: The Gunman
programme.desc: Sean Penn stars as Jim Terrier, an ex-special forces government contractor who is betrayed by the organization he once worked for and must go on the run in a relentless game of cat and mouse across Africa and Europe.

programme.title: Margin Call
programme.desc: Set in the high-stakes world of the ﬁnancial industry, this film follows the key players at an investment ﬁrm during a 24-hour period in the early stages of the 2008 ﬁnancial crisis. When an entry-level analyst unlocks information that could prove to be the downfall of the ﬁrm, a roller-coaster ride ensues as decisions both ﬁnancial and moral catapult the lives of all involved into mayhem.

programme.title: XTC: This is Pop
programme.desc: Emerging from the late 1970s punk and new wave explosion, XTC amasses a devoted following with hit singles like 'Making Plans For Nigel' and 'Mayor Of Simpleton'. Presenting a journey into the world of the band, the film includes newly filmed interviews with Andy Partridge, Colin Moulding, Dave Gregory and Terry Chambers. Through a mixture of animation, archive and specially-shot sequences, the film explores the minds of principle songwriters, Partridge and Moulding.

programme.title: A Better Life
programme.desc: Carlos Galindo (Demian Bichir) dreamed of good things for his wife and son when they crossed the border into the US. After his wife leaves him, Carlos' only goal was to make sure his son Luis was given the opportunities he never had. After years of hard work, he still finds himself drifting apart from Luis, now a teenager, who is susceptible to peer pressures. Carlos borrows what little money he can and invests it all into his own gardening business, hoping to finally achieve the better life he always envisioned for his son.

programme.title: The Pirates of Somalia
programme.desc: An ambitious young journalist (Evan Peters) embeds himself with a dangerous band of pirates in Somalia to get an unfiltered investigative perspective, but his inexperience threatens to derail his plans.

programme.title: Rebel in the Rye
programme.desc: Set amidst the colorful backdrop of mid-20th century New York City, this film follows a young J.D. Salinger (Nicholas Hoult) as he struggles to find his voice, pursues a love affair with famed socialite Oona O'Neill (Zoey Deutch) and fights on the frontlines of World War II. It's these experiences that inform the creation of his masterpiece, The Catcher in the Rye, bringing him overnight fame (and notoriety) and leading him to withdraw from the public eye for the rest of his life.

programme.title: Pork Pie
programme.desc: A trio of accidental outlaws travel the length of New Zealand in a yellow Mini, protesting conformity and chasing lost love, with a posse of cops and a media frenzy hot in their pursuit.

programme.title: The Host
programme.desc: When an unseen enemy threatens mankind by taking over their bodies and erasing their memories, Melanie (Saoirse Ronan) risks everything to protect the people she loves — her friends, her brother and her Uncle Jeb (William Hurt).

programme.title: The Illusionist
programme.desc: Set in early 20th-century Vienna, a stage magician uses his magic to win back the great love of his life from a brutal enemy, her fiancé, who is also the powerful crowned prince of Austria. Stars Edward Norton, Paul Giamatti and Jessica Biel.

programme.title: Episode #511
programme.desc: Brian reevaluates his priorities after the bombing of Babylon; Michael continues to recover in the hospital, while a Liberty Avenue vigil for the victims ends in chaos.(c)

credits.director: Graphic Language, Adult Content, Violence, Nudity, Strong Sexual Content

programme.title: Episode #512
programme.desc: Brian and Justin are getting married! Melanie and Lindsay plan on moving the family to Canada; Ted may have finally found Mr. Right; Emmett catches Drew with another man.(c)

credits.director: Graphic Language, Adult Content, Nudity, Strong Sexual Content

programme.title: Episode #513
programme.desc: Brian and Justin prepare to marry; Lindsay and Melanie move to Canada; Michael's asked to represent the Committee for Human Rights; Ted sees his relationship with Tad for what it really is. The beat of Babylon continues...(c)

credits.director: Adult Content, Adult Language, Nudity, Strong Sexual Content

programme.title: The Host
programme.desc: When an unseen enemy threatens mankind by taking over their bodies and erasing their memories, Melanie (Saoirse Ronan) risks everything to protect the people she loves — her friends, her brother and her Uncle Jeb (William Hurt).

programme.title: Rebel in the Rye

It's these experiences that inform the creation of his masterpiece, The Catcher in the Rye, bringing him overnight fame (and notoriety) and leading him to withdraw from the public eye for the rest of his life.

programme.title: Kevin Smith: Silent But Deadly
programme.desc: Kevin Smith, the filmmaker, is anything but quiet in this new comedy special that was recorded an hour before his widely reported massive heart attack in February. But before he nearly died backstage, he killed onstage discussing his marriage, his kid, his friends and his work (or lack thereof).

programme.title: Arsenal
programme.desc: Family loyalty is tested when a successful businessman (Adrian Grenier) is willing to do anything for his deadbeat brother (Johnathon Schaech) — including tracking down the vicious mobster (Nicolas Cage) holding him hostage.

programme.title: The Illusionist
programme.desc: Set in early 20th-century Vienna, a stage magician uses his magic to win back the great love of his life from a brutal enemy, her fiancé, who is also the powerful crowned prince of Austria. Stars Edward Norton, Paul Giamatti and Jessica Biel.

programme.title: Skybound
programme.desc: Five plane passengers are unable to land after a gigantic disaster happens on the ground.

programme.title: The Game
programme.desc: Academy Award winner Michael Douglas stars as a man who's chosen to participate in a live-action game that penetrates all aspects of his life. But when it begins to go out of control, he tries to escape. Directed by David Fincher.

programme.title: A Beautiful Mind
programme.desc: A mathematical genius, John Forbes Nash Jr, makes an astonishing discovery early in his career and stands on the brink of international acclaim. But he soon finds himself on a harrowing journey of self-discovery. Russell Crowe stars.

programme.title: Bridget Jones: The Edge of Reason
programme.desc: Just when Bridget thinks life is perfect, her relationship with the dreamy Mark Darcy implodes. She sets off on a whirlwind business trip to Thailand where she encounters old flame Daniel Cleaver, and her life gets out-of-control.

programme.title: Steel Magnolias
programme.desc: A wedding is about to take place in Chinquapin, Louisiana. The bride is Shelby (Julia Roberts), a headstrong young beauty whose iron-willed mother, M'Lynn (Sally Field), would do anything for her. Giant-haired Dolly Parton is Truvy, the owner of the beauty parlor that serves as the town's unofficial hub. Dropping in to exchange gossip are Ouiser (Shirley MacLaine), the richest and meanest woman in town, and Clairee (Olympia Dukakis), an elegant widow with a sly delivery. Together they provide each other with strength and friendship.

programme.title: Man On A Ledge
programme.desc: When former NYPD officer turned prison escapee Nick Cassidy (Sam Worthington) enters the famed Roosevelt Hotel on 45th and Madison in New York City, heads to one of the highest floors and steps out a window onto the ledge, he threatens more than just his own well-being. A whole city is about to seize up, including some very nervous people with some very big secrets. Elizabeth Banks, Ed Harris and Edward Burns co-star in this propulsive, twisty action thriller.

programme.title: Love Means Zero
programme.desc: At 85 years old, Nick Bollettieri is a living legend. At his tennis academy in Florida, he raised a generation of champions. Courier. Seles. Agassi. No other coach has matched his success, his dominance or his fame. His greatness, though, came at a terrible price - broken marriages, financial ruin and a fractured relationship with his surrogate son and most cherished student, Andre Agassi. This documentary tells his story and explores the cost of his all-consuming drive for greatness. Directed and produced by Jason Kohn.

programme.title: Bridget Jones: The Edge of Reason
programme.desc: Just when Bridget thinks life is perfect, her relationship with the dreamy Mark Darcy implodes. She sets off on a whirlwind business trip to Thailand where she encounters old flame Daniel Cleaver, and her life gets out-of-control.(n)

programme.title: Steel Magnolias
programme.desc: A wedding is about to take place in Chinquapin, Louisiana. The bride is Shelby (Julia Roberts), a headstrong young beauty whose iron-willed mother, M'Lynn (Sally Field), would do anything for her. Giant-haired Dolly Parton is Truvy, the owner of the beauty parlor that serves as the town's unofficial hub. Dropping in to exchange gossip are Ouiser (Shirley MacLaine), the richest and meanest woman in town, and Clairee (Olympia Dukakis), an elegant widow with a sly delivery. Together they provide each other with strength and friendship.(n)

A whole city is about to seize up, including some very nervous people with some very big secrets. Elizabeth Banks, Ed Harris and Edward Burns co-star in this propulsive, twisty action thriller.(n)
